description: Learn now to use rope to create beautiful decorative bondage, such as elaborate chest harnesses and even a complete bra. Plus, learn how to tie the simplest yet most effective hair tie ever for hair bondage using a ponytail. Tom Foolery's tutorial demonstrates the versatile Cross Knot, the Constrictor Knot (for hair bondage), plus an elaborate yet effective rope chest harness, and a close-knit weaving technique ideal for making a bra or panty out of rope.
title: Decorative Bondage and Hair Ties
